sentences.english: These people said that China feared giving ammunition to critics of its currency policies at the monetary fund and beyond.
sentences.chinese: 他們指出中國害怕在貨幣政策上授人以柄。

sentences.english: When using loudspeakers , be sure to use your discretion. You can't teach others with a cudgel.
sentences.chinese: 使用高音喇叭，千萬要見機行事，不能授人以柄。
